function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Integration of institutional theory with past pandemics","Impact":"Inadequate response to future pandemics","Mitigation":"Developing more comprehensive pandemic response strategies","Technologies":"Data analysis and predictive modeling","People":"Service firms, institutions, and customers","Owner":"Researchers, policymakers, and service industry professionals"},{"Description":"Impact of COVID-19 on service firms and customer interaction","Impact":"Decreased customer satisfaction and profitability","Mitigation":"Implementing innovative customer interaction strategies and service quality improvements","Technologies":"Machine learning and artificial intelligence for personalized services","People":"Service firms and customers","Owner":"Service industry professionals, researchers, and technology developers"}]}
